marketing information: The fully featured 1928L touchmonitor offers best in class optical performance mated to the leading touch technologies-IntelliTouch surface acoustical wave and AccuTouch five-wire resistive-along with a combination touch controller, DVI, VGA and built-in speakers. The product can be ordered in beige or gray color, touch and non-touch enabled versions.The 1928L carries a wide array of certifications and includes an innovative IPX1 enclosure design which ensures that the entire touchmonitor sheds water and is safe from liquid drops and spills. As a result the 1928L is an excellent fit for any application benefiting from DVI-D input, speakers and best in class image performance.
